citations.narrative:
During the inspection 3 piglets were observed running around the facility outside of their primary enclosure. There were
two places along the lower portion of the primary enclosure fence that had enlarged openings. While standing near this
fence the 3 piglets ran back into this enclosure. Failure to securely contain the animals in their primary enclosure could
result in injury to these animals. All primary enclosures must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to
contain all animals. These holes must be repaired to ensure these piglets are securely contained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
During the inspection 3 piglets were observed running around the facility outside of their primary enclosure.  There were 
two places along the lower portion of the primary enclosure fence that had enlarged openings.  While standing near this 
fence the 3 piglets ran back into this enclosure.  Failure to securely contain the animals in their primary enclosure could 
result in injury to these animals.  All primary enclosures must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to 
contain all animals.  These holes must be repaired to ensure these piglets are securely contained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
